function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid spreading of infectious diseases in pre-pandemic homes","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Residents’ mental, residential spaces, requiring adaptation of housing to face such situations.","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 has changed the perception of home space and created new preferences in the real estate market.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic has highlighted the shortcomings of cities and provided an opportunity for sustainability-oriented design.","category":"Visions&Priorities","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Study of air conditioners and their relationship to the global pandemic may uncover risks related
